name: Evil Pieces
description:
Story:  Imagine buying an old  rpg  boardgame and JUST  before you throw the first dice.... an  ancient  curse   emerges, sucking you onto the board, forcing you to play a real and cursed game of horror. 

You are a mere pawn of the devil.   Will you survive? Will you make it to the end?

Who knows.

CONCEPT:  The dungeon consists of squares  , which will show themselves only when the player rolls a dice on them. Depending on the field and the result of the dice, something good or something very bad may happen.. 

Example: If you get a high number on a  gold field, you will be  get more gold and more upgrades but if you for example throw a high number on a monster field, ... you probably die! Also, there are fields which   can yield   unlimited wealth or an almost safe death... making them high risk and high reward.

I would love to add more diverse and interesting fields to the game (for example a boss field would be cool) but due to time constraint this wasnt really possible.
